00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_RANGEUPDATEBARRIER_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_RANGEUPDATEBARRIER_H
00024 
00025 #include <boost/thread/condition.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/thread/mutex.hpp>
00027 
00028 
00029 namespace Hypertable {
00030 
00031   class RangeUpdateBarrier {
00032   public:
00033 
00034     RangeUpdateBarrier() : m_hold_updates(false), m_update_counter(0) {
00035     }
00036 
00039     void enter() {
00040       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00041       while (m_hold_updates)
00042         m_updates_unblocked_cond.wait(lock);
00043       m_update_counter++;
00044     }
00045 
00048     void exit() {
00049       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00050       m_update_counter--;
00051       if (m_hold_updates && m_update_counter == 0)
00052         m_updates_quiesced_cond.notify_one();
00053     }
00054 
00057     void put_up() {
00058       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00059       m_hold_updates = true;
00060       while (m_update_counter > 0)
00061         m_updates_quiesced_cond.wait(lock);
00062     }
00063 
00066     void take_down() {
00067       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00068       m_hold_updates = false;
00069       m_updates_unblocked_cond.notify_all();
00070     }
00071 
00072     class ScopedActivator {
00073     public:
00074       ScopedActivator(RangeUpdateBarrier &barrier) : m_barrier(barrier) {
00075         m_barrier.put_up();
00076       }
00077       ~ScopedActivator() {
00078         m_barrier.take_down();
00079       }
00080     private:
00081       RangeUpdateBarrier &m_barrier;
00082     };
00083 
00084   private:
00085     boost::mutex m_mutex;
00086     boost::condition m_updates_unblocked_cond;
00087     boost::condition m_updates_quiesced_cond;
00088     bool             m_hold_updates;
00089     uint32_t         m_update_counter;
00090 
00091   };
00092 
00093 }
